hazards.title: Aqshy Realmscape
hazards.flavour: The arena temperature spikes tremendously, the air shimmering in the sudden heat.
hazards.effect: Roll an attack dice for each fighter. On a of !crit! that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage unless it would take this fighter out of action.

hazards.title: Burning Comet
hazards.flavour: The ceiling of the arena opens like a colossal observatory. One of countless shining stars detaches from the firmament and crashes into the arena floor as a burning chunk of star-matter.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. The winner *places* the Burning Comet token in an *empty* hex. When the Burning Comet token is *placed* all fighter adjacent to that hex are *dealt* 1 damage. That hex is blocked.

hazards.title: Ghur Ambershard
hazards.flavour: A roar that reverberates in the fighters' skull echoes around the arena as large ambershards break through the stone floor . Fighters near these shards find that their weapons gnashing and tearing at the enemy, as if driven by a bestial vigour of their own.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. The winner *places* the Ghur Ambershard token in an *empty* hex. That hex is *blocked*. Range 1 and Range 2 *Attack actions* made by fighters adjacent to the Ghur Ambershard token have +1 Damage.

hazards.title: Teleportation Glitch
hazards.flavour: 'Ah, company...' - Widow Caitha
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, each player picks one surviving friendly fighter. *Place* each fighter in the hex that was occupied by the other fighter when you picked them.

hazards.title: Shyish Realmscape
hazards.flavour: Death magic suffuses the arena and healed wounds reopen, allowing blood and death to flow freely once more.
hazards.effect: At the start of the end phase, the players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, the players roll an attack dice for each friendly fighter that has one or more wound tokens. On a roll of !hammer! that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage.

hazards.title: Azyr Realmscape
hazards.flavour: Crackling lightning fills the chamber, striking those too slow to avoid it.
hazards.effect: At the start of the end phase, each fighter that has no Move or Charge tokens is *dealt* 1 damage.

hazards.title: Katophrane Defence Systems
hazards.flavour: The eyes of a nearby statue blaze as they open, and a lethal beam of pure magical energy tracks across the ground.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. The winner picks an *empty* or *occupied* hex, then three more hexes, each of which must be adjacent to the last hex picked. No hex may be picked more than once. The winner roll an attack dice for each fighter standing in a picked hex; on a roll of !hammer! that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage

hazards.title: Whirling Saw Blade
hazards.flavour: 'Aarrrggh!'
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. The winner picks one fighter of the battlefield and rolls an attack dice. On a roll of !hammer! or !crit!, that fighter is dealt 1 damage.

hazards.title: A Prize Revealed
hazards.flavour: 'There it is warriors. Quickly before the others arrive!' - Gwynne Ironsoul
hazards.effect: In an end phase, if a fighter is standing in the hex that is closest to the centre of the battlefield, that fighter's player gains 3 glory points and *completes* this card. If multiple hexes are equidistant to the centre of the battlefield, the players *roll off* at the start of the end phase. The winner decides which of those hexes will be affected by this card.

hazards.title: Unremitting Violence
hazards.flavour: 'Rend their bodies and tear their essence from their screaming souls!' - Lady Harrow
hazards.effect: All *Attack action* have *Innate* (!hammer!!sword!).

hazards.title: Crumbling Floors
hazards.flavour: The arena floor hides many hazards, not least of which are deep, darks pits that open suddenly beneath unwary warriors.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, the players roll a defence dice for each friendly fighter that has the !shield! characteristic. On a roll of !shield! of !crit!, that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage.

hazards.title: Acid Bath
hazards.flavour: Originally used to clean the Katophrane's mechanical warriors after battle, only thick armour will protect you against this deluge of acid.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, the players roll a defence dice for each friendly fighter that has the !dodge! characteristic. On a roll of !dodge! or !crit!, that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage

hazards.title: Fluctuating Power
hazards.flavour: The Dreadfane pulses with forbidden power, and opportunity awaits those who can harness it.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, the players *draw* two power cards, and the *discard* two power cards.

hazards.title: Spark of Ignition
hazards.flavour: A stray spark of magical power leaks into the ancient machinery of the arena and it lashes out, striking anyone unlucky enough to be nearby.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the winner, each player picks up to one enemy fighter adjacent to a *blocked* hex and roll an attack dice. On a roll of !hammer! or !crit! that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage.

hazards.title: Contest of Champions
hazards.flavour: 'Let me show you true strength!' - Tavian of Sarnassus
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, each player picks up to one friendly surviving friendly fighter. Those fighters become Inspired.

hazards.title: Tilted Arena Floor
hazards.flavour: The arena suddenly tilts as though upon a huge axis, sending fighters flying.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. The winner picks an *edge* hex. Each player pushes each enemy fighter one hex towards the picked hex, starting with the player who lost the *roll off*. In a fighter cannot be *pushed* this way, that fighter is not *pushed*.

hazards.title: Change of Plans
hazards.flavour: 'I've' has an idea...' - Tavian of Sarnassus
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, each players *draws* on objective card and *discards* one objective card. If a player has no cards remaining in their objective deck, they do not *draw* or*discard* an objective card.

hazards.title: Whirring Blades
hazards.flavour: Spinning saw blades emerge from the walls of the arena.
hazards.effect: Any fighter that makes a *Move action* that takes them through, or is *pushed* through, and *edge* hex is *dealt* 1 damage for each *edge* hex they move or are *pushed* through.

hazards.title: Gravity Well
hazards.flavour: An ancient spell manifests a screaming vortex of energy in the centre of the arena, dragging all towards it.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, each player *pushes* each enemy fighter one hex towards the centre of the battlefield. If multiple hexes are equidistant to the centre of the battlefield, the players *roll off*. The winner decides which of those hexes will be affected by this card. If a fighter cannot be *pushed* in this way, that fighter is not *pushed*.

hazards.title: Spear Traps
hazards.flavour: Rusted mechanism squeal and archaic weapons spring out from the walls and retract, gouging nearby fighters.
hazards.effect: The players *roll off*. Starting with the loser, the players make a defence roll for each of their fighter standing in an *edge* hex. If there are no *successes* in the roll, that fighter is *dealt* 1 damage.
